column5: I do belive Art is correct.  I could have tittled my topic on the Chicago matter in a better way.  My intent was to bring to light the issues facing the US engineers and the attitude to the great lakes.   First the issues with the carp and now the untreated sewage.  I am a firm believer that the barrier to Lake Michigan should be a sealed permant one.  If our freinds to the south still find this a tad distasteful, well we are all entitled to our opinions.  Regards

I agree it is an important piece and will gladly reopen it if the title is not inflammatory. Right now with the change over it is a little hectic here and I don't need a distraction such as it was.  Thanks for your understanding and I have turned it back on with a different title.   Art
Yeah that title was so offensive. LOL Read any forum related to hockey as a comparison.
Censorship? I'm frankly shocked and...... wait for it............Offended!!   But I guess I can understand, well kind of, maybe?

I think the slang term "butthurt" and it's definition accurately describe the locking of that thread  butthurt (comparative more butthurt, superlative most butthurt) (slang) Overly annoyed, bothered or bugged because of a perceived insult; aimlessly offended; having an overly sensitive ego.
